description:
The reckless Kuwabara reminisces about a first encounter with Yusuke while being held captive by Shinobu. Will his anger be enough to power his escape and help Yusuke defeat Shinobu?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eizou Hakusho II: Kuwabara no Shou
Eizou Hakusho II: The Kuwabara Chapters
